body: At 6th level, a saurian shaman's wild shape ability functions at her druid level –2. If she takes on the form of a reptile or a dinosaur, she instead uses her druid level +2.
name: Wild Shape
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Saurian Shaman/Wild Shape
